DataListSpec.Name: Constituent Photo Analysis Process Data List
DataListSpec.Description: A data list showing constituent photo analysis process records.
DataListSpec.Author: Blackbaud Demo

SPDataList.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_CONSTITUENTPHOTOANALYSISPROCESS as set nocount on;
select USR_CONSTITUENTPHOTOANALYSISPROCESS.ID, USR_CONSTITUENTPHOTOANALYSISPROCESS.NAME, USR_CONSTITUENTPHOTOANALYSISPROCESS.DESCRIPTION, IDSETREGISTER.NAME SELECTION from dbo.USR_CONSTITUENTPHOTOANALYSISPROCESS left join dbo.IDSETREGISTER on IDSETREGISTER.ID = USR_CONSTITUENTPHOTOANALYSISPROCESS.IDSETREGISTERID order by NAME;
